functions.name: Pitch
functions.description: Current pitch displayed on the ADI.

functions.name: Bank
functions.description: Current bank displayed on the ADI.

functions.name: Course Warning Flag
functions.description: Indicates thatn an operative ILS or TACAN signal is received.

functions.name: Bank Steering Bar Offset
functions.description: Location of bank steering bar relative to the middle of the ADI.
functions.valueDescription: (-1 to 1) -1 is full left and 1 is full right.

functions.name: Pitch Steering Bar Offset
functions.description: Location of pitch steering bar relative to the middle of the ADI.
functions.valueDescription: (-1 to 1) 1 is full up and -1 is full down.

functions.name: Slip Ball
functions.description: Current position of the slip ball relative to the center of the tube.
functions.valueDescription: (-1 to 1) -1 is full left and 1 is full right.

functions.name: Attitude Warning Flag
functions.description: Indicates that the ADI has lost electrical power or otherwise been disabled.

functions.name: Glide Slope Warning Flag
functions.description: Indicates that the ADI is not recieving a ILS glide slope signal.

functions.name: Glide Slope Indicator
functions.description: Location of the glide slope indicator relative to the middle of the slope deviation scale.
functions.valueDescription: (-1 to 1) 1 is full up and -1 is full down.

functions.name: Altitude
functions.description: Barometric altitude above sea level of the aircraft.

functions.name: Angle of Attack
functions.description: Current angle of attack of the aircraft.

functions.name: RPM
functions.description: Current percentage of maximum RPM for the APU.

functions.name: Exhaust Gas Temperature
functions.description: Current temperature of the APU exhaust gas.

functions.name: Emegency Trim Hat
functions.description: Current position of the hat switch.

functions.name: Left Aileron Disengage Indicator
functions.description: Lit when the left aileron is disengaged.

functions.name: Right Aileron Disengage Indicator
functions.description: Lit when the right aileron is disengaged.

functions.name: Left Elevator Disengage Indicator
functions.description: Lit when the left elevator is disengaged.

functions.name: Right Elevator Disengage Indicator
functions.description: Lit when the right elevator is disengaged.

functions.name: Manual Reversion Flight Control System Switch
Take Off Trim Indicator
functions.description: Lit when reseting autopilot for take off trim

functions.name: ENG START CYCLE
functions.description: Lit if either engine is in engine start process.

functions.name: L-HYD PRESS
functions.description: Lit if left hydraulic system pressure falls below 1,000 psi.

functions.name: R-HYD PRESS
functions.description: Lit if right hydraulic system pressure falls below 1,000 psi.

functions.name: GUN UNSAFE
functions.description: Lit if gun is capable of being fired.

functions.name: ANTI SKID
functions.description: Lit if landing gear is down but anti-skid is disengaged.

functions.name: L-HYD RES
functions.description: Lit if left hyudraulic fluid reservoir is low.

functions.name: R-HYD RES
functions.description: Lit if right hyudraulic fluid reservoir is low.

functions.name: OXY LOW
functions.description: Lit if oxygen gauge indices 0.5 liters or less.

functions.name: ELEV DISENG
functions.description: Lit if at least one elevator is disengaged from the Emergency Flight Control panel.

functions.name: SEAT NOT ARMED
functions.description: Lit if ground safety lever is in the safe position.

functions.name: BLEED AIR LEAK
functions.description: Lit if bleed air is 400 degrees or higher.

functions.name: AIL DISENG
functions.description: Lit if at least one aileron is disngaged from the Emergency FLight Control panel.

functions.name: L-AIL TAB
functions.description: Lit if left aileron is not at normal positoin due to MRFCS.

functions.name: R-AIL TAB
functions.description: Lit if right aileron is not at normal positoin due to MRFCS.

functions.name: SERVICE AIR HOT
functions.description: Lit if air temperature exceeds allowable ECS range.

functions.name: PITCH SAS
functions.description: Lit if at least one pitch SAS channel has been disabled.

functions.name: L-ENG HOT
functions.description: Lit if left engine ITT exceeds 880 degrees C.

functions.name: R-ENG HOT
functions.description: Lit if right engine ITT exceeds 880 degrees C.

functions.name: WINDSHIELD HOT
functions.description: Lit if windshield temperature exceeds 150 degrees F.

functions.name: YAW SAS
functions.description: Lit if at least one yaw SAS channel has been disabled.

functions.name: L-ENG OIL PRESS
functions.description: Lit if left engine oil pressure is less than 27.5 psi.

functions.name: R-ENG OIL PRESS
functions.description: Lit if right engine oil pressure is less than 27.5 psi.

functions.name: GCAS
functions.description: Lit if LASTE failure is detected that affects GCAS.

functions.name: L-MAIN PUMP
functions.description: Lit if boost pump pressure is low.

functions.name: R-MAIN PUMP
functions.description: Lit if boost pump pressure is low.

functions.name: LASTE
functions.description: Lit if fault is detected in LASTE computer.

functions.name: L-WING PUMP
functions.description: Lit if boost pump pressure is low.

functions.name: R-WING PUMP
functions.description: Lit if boost pump pressure is low.

functions.name: HARS
functions.description: Lit if HARS heading or attitude is invalid.

functions.name: IFF MODE-4
functions.description: Lit if inoperative mode 4 capability is detected.

functions.name: L-MAIN FUEL LOW
functions.description: Lit if left main fuel tank has 500 pounds or less.

functions.name: R-MAIN FUEL LOW
functions.description: Lit if right main fuel tank has 500 pounds or less.

functions.name: L-R TKS UNEQUAL
functions.description: Lit if thers is a 750 or more pund difference between the two main fuel tanks.

functions.name: EAC
functions.description: Lit if EAC is turned off.

functions.name: L-FUEL PRESS
functions.description: Lit if low fuel pressure is detected in fuel feed lines.

functions.name: R-FUEL PRESS
functions.description: Lit if low fuel pressure is detected in fuel feed lines.

functions.name: NAV
functions.description: Lit if there is a CDU failure while in alignment mode.

functions.name: STALL SYS
functions.description: Lit if there is a power failure to the AoA and Mach meters.

functions.name: L-CONV
functions.description: Lit if left electrical converter fails.

functions.name: R-CONV
functions.description: Lit if right electrical converter fails.

functions.name: APU GEN
functions.description: Lit if APU is on but APU generator is not set to PWR.

functions.name: L-GEN
functions.description: Lit if left generator has shut down or AC power is out of limits.

functions.name: R-GEN
functions.description: Lit if right generator has shut down or AC power is out of limits.

functions.name: INST INV
functions.description: Lit if AC powered systems are not receiving power from inverter.

functions.name: Missle Launch Indicator
functions.description: Flashes when missile has been launched near your aircraft.

functions.name: Priority Status Indicator
functions.description: Lit when priority display mode is active.

functions.name: Unknown Status Indicator
functions.description: Lit when unknown threat display is active.

functions.name: Clock Function Type
functions.description: Text for Clock or Elapsed Time

functions.name: Time Hours:Mins
functions.description: Text Value of Hours and Minutes

functions.name: Toggle Clock and Elapsed Time Modes
Start, Stop and Reset Elapsed Timer
Left Engine Throttle
functions.description: Position of the Left Engine Throttle.

functions.name: Right Engine Throttle
functions.description: Position of the Right Engine Throttle.

functions.name: Cabin Pressure
functions.description: Current cabin pressure of the aircraft.

functions.name: Left Engine Fire Indicator
functions.description: Indicator lights when a fire is detected in the left engine.

functions.name: APU Fire Indicator
functions.description: Indicator lights when a fire is detedted in the APU.

functions.name: Right Engine Fire Indicator
functions.description: Indicator lights when a fire is detected in the right engine.

functions.name: Total Fuel
functions.description: Fuel amount shown on the totalizer.

functions.name: Left Quantity
functions.description: Quantity displayed on the left needle

functions.name: Right Quantity
functions.description: Quantity displayed on the right needle

functions.name: SYN-IND Sync Needle
functions.description: Position of needle on SYN-IND anannunciation.

functions.name: Distance to beacon
functions.description: Range in nautical miles to the currently selected steerpoint or TACAN station.

functions.name: Range Flag
functions.description: This flag indicates that the range to steer point or TACAN station is not available.

functions.name: Bearing 1
functions.description: Direction of currently selected TACAN station or the selected UHF station relative to current heading.
functions.valueDescription: When both TACAN and ADF are selected ADF UHF station will take priority.  If neither mod is selected will align to current steer point.  Direction is realative to current heading.

functions.name: Heading
functions.description: Current heading displayed on the HSI

functions.name: Bearing 2
functions.description: Direction of currently selected steer point relative to current heading.
functions.valueDescription: Direction is realtive to current heading.

functions.name: Desired Heading
functions.description: Direction of desired heading needle relative to current heading.
functions.valueDescription: Rotation realtive to current heading towards the desired heading.

functions.name: Power Off Flag
functions.description: This flag is on when the HSI gaue has no power.

functions.name: Course Deviation
functions.description: Current offset of the deviation needle.
functions.valueDescription: (-1 to 1) -1 is full left and 1 is full right.

functions.name: From Flag
functions.description: This flag is displayed when heading away from VOR.

functions.name: To Flag
functions.description: This flag is displayed when heading towards VOR.

functions.name: Bearing Flag
functions.description: This flag is displayed if the aircraft is significantly off course.

functions.name: Desired Course
functions.description: Direction of desired course relative to the current heading.
functions.valueDescription: Rotation realtive to current heading towards the desired course.

functions.name: left pressure
functions.description: Current pressure in the left hydraulics system

functions.name: right pressure
functions.description: Current pressure in the right hydraulics system

functions.name: Airspeed
functions.description: Current indicated air speed of the aircraft.

functions.name: Max Airspeed
functions.description: Current altitude compensated, limiting structural airspeed of the aircraft.

functions.name: Core Speed
functions.description: Engine core speed as a percent of compressor RPM.

functions.name: Gear Nose Safe Indicator
functions.description: Lit when the nose gear is down and locked.

functions.name: Gear Left Safe Indicator
functions.description: Lit when the left gear is down and locked.

functions.name: Gear Right Safe Indicator
functions.description: Lit when the right gear is down and locked.

functions.name: Auxiliary Landing Gear Handle Lock Button
Gear Handle Indicator
functions.description: Lit when the landing gear are moving between down and stowed position.

functions.name: Gun Ready Indicator
functions.description: Indicator is lit when the GAU-8 cannon is armed and ready to fire.

functions.name: Nose Wheel Steering Indicator
functions.description: Indicator is lit when nose wheel steering is engaged.

functions.name: Marker Beacon Indicator
functions.description: Indicator is lit when in ILS mode and a beacon is overflown.

functions.name: Canopy Unlocked Indicator
functions.description: Indicator is lit when canopy is open.

functions.name: UHF Homing Indicator
functions.description: Lit when the UHF control panel is ste to ADF.

functions.name: VHF/FM Homing Indicator
functions.description: Lit when the VHF/FM control panel is set to homing mode.

functions.name: Volume
functions.description: Indicates the quantity of liquid oxygen in the regulator.

functions.name: Core Speed
functions.description: Engine core speed as a percent of compressor RPM

functions.name: Pitch
functions.description: Current pitch displayed on the SAI.

functions.name: Bank
functions.description: Current bank displayed on the SAI.

functions.name: Warning Flag
functions.description: Displayed when SAI is caged or non-functional.

functions.name: vertical velocity
functions.description: Current vertical velocity of the aircraft.

functions.name: indicated airspeed
functions.description: Current indicated air speed of the aircraft.

functions.name: angle of attack
functions.description: Current angle of attack for the aircraft.

functions.name: radar altitude
functions.description: Current radar altitude of the aircraft.

functions.name: Altitude above target tens of thousands of feet
Altitude above target thousands of feet
Display and Adjust Altitude Alert Values
Master Caution Indicator
functions.description: Indicator lamp on master caution button.

functions.name: Fequency
functions.description: Currently tuned frequency of UHF radio.

functions.name: Vertical Velocity
functions.description: Current vertical velocity of the aircraft.
